name: Shadow Woods
description:
A simple, 3 level, 15 minute game inspired by old school NES platformers (namely Ninja Gaiden).

Controls: 

WASD- Move

K - Attack

Spacebar - Jump

(No controller support for now guys, sorry).

It's a game I made over the summer to relearn Unity. I didn't mean for it to be great or that complete. Just a project to do and move on.

And that's how I learned that it takes way more effort than I tought to make a good feeling 2D platformer and that despite the big challenge, I should learn to code turn based RPG's, cause realyl that's what I want to do.
